listAsq.title: What types of garage properties fall within your acquisition scope?
listAsq.content: Our portfolio encompasses a wide range of garage properties, including both attached and standalone structures. We have the expertise to handle various garage configurations, adapting our acquisition strategy to each unique property.

listAsq.title: How is the valuation of garage properties determined?
listAsq.content: Our valuation process incorporates multiple factors, including location, dimensions, structural condition, and current market dynamics. For a rapid, preliminary assessment, we offer an online valuation service. Simply send us photographs, key specifications, and any pertinent additional information via our messaging platform, and we'll promptly provide you with a competitive offer.

listAsq.title: Is it possible to sell a garage independently of an associated residence?
listAsq.content: Absolutely. Our acquisition program is flexible, allowing for the purchase of garages as standalone assets, separate from any associated residential property. This option provides homeowners with additional liquidity opportunities.

listAsq.title: Do you engage in multi-unit garage acquisitions?
listAsq.content: Yes, our acquisition capabilities extend from single-unit garages to multi-unit structures and large-scale parking facilities. We have the resources and expertise to handle garage properties of varying scales and complexities.

listAsq.title: How do you approach garages with existing rental agreements?
listAsq.content: We are well-equipped to acquire properties with active rental contracts. In such scenarios, we assume the role of the new property owner, ensuring a seamless transition for both the seller and the current tenants.

listAsq.title: Are you interested in garages utilized for commercial purposes?
listAsq.content: Certainly. Our acquisition program encompasses garages used for both personal and commercial applications. We recognize the diverse utilization of garage spaces and are prepared to evaluate all types of garage properties, regardless of their current use.

listBottom1.title: Urgent Redemption of boats
listBottom1.text:
Over the course of the company's existence, we've redemptionized a large number of used vehicles of various makes and models. We've learned to be smart about Redemption: the vehicles are de-registered and all transactions are legally correct.
We offer services on car buying in all districts of Kiev (Kiev region) and Ukraine. Those who do not want to spend time and effort to find a client, it is better to use the service 'autoRedemption'. Of course you will not get the maximum value for the car, but 90-95% of the market value, we guarantee you! value we guarantee you!
Still, if you decide to sell a used car on your own, it is recommended to be patient. patience. Selling a car on your own can take months. And without an understanding of the market. it is difficult to set a price that will suit both you and the potential buyer. You'll end up wasting your time and effort for nothing.

listBottom2.title: Boat buying in Kiev
listBottom2.text: Everything is simple! Send us a photo of the vehicle in a convenient messenger (viber, telegram, instagram). Within 4-5 minutes appraiser Vladimir will write the cost of Redemption. Having come to an agreement, we will immediately go to the You! That you would not have traveled in vain, we will come to you ourselves, absolutely free, without any or claims if you refuse our services. We value the reputation and time of our customers!
